My belief in equality of opportunity for all students shines through, making me want to ensure the other player has a fair share. The desire to not leave anyone behind drives me as well; I feel strongly that every individual should have an equal chance. Intentionally, I see this more as an investment in potential rather than simply sharing resources.

My deep passion for education and my role as a teacher make giving money away with such precision important. I strive to ensure that the other player receives enough to make it worthwhile while still being fair. My intention is clear: I want both of us to benefit equally from this opportunity, even if our identities remain unknown.

Finally, I will give $5 dollars
